phrases: Our adolescence is the season of love.
And we are curious about boys.
That is the greatest mission for us girls.
But for girls, life is more complicated than just love.
He said there was a really cute girl named Makita in class 1-5.
That was so cute just now!
Did you see those puppy dog eyes?
Why do guys like girls like Makita Yuuri?
It is like... she is stupid, or simple...
It is not like she is cute enough to say it, right?
Futaba, if you put a little work into being girly, you would be popular.
Actually, you are just not feminine enough.
It is fine, it is fine!
I am bad with boys, anyway.
- What is with that way of putting it?
Futaba, have you been in love with someone before?
But this is the second year of high school!
He is the transfer student in our class, right?
Then I guess I will go with you.
the Tanaka-kun I knew when I was 13.
The rain started pretty suddenly, did not it?
The rain started pretty suddenly, did not it?
I am telling you, my name is Mabuchi.
I have been in Nagasaki ever since.
You are as dull as ever, are not you?
I wondered when you would figure it out.
- you are completely different from bef-
Well, how about a reunion hug?
Why has he changed that much?
Tanaka-kun was not the type to come on so strong...
He smiled a lot, and was very kind.
The rain started pretty suddenly, did not it?
whenever our eyes met, we would look away.
And in the first summer vacation of middle school...
At the clock in Sankaku Park.
I am pretty sure that is what I heard.
He never came to Sankaku Park, or to the festival.
Just like that, he never came.
Not even to school when the new semester started.
It would be better if you had a bag, right?
It looks like I am all out right now, hold on.
Do not try to fool me.
You were just trying to run off.
Hey, someone call the discipline officer!
She paid me just a second ago.
You are so mean, old lady.
Are you letting out your stress?
That is not what you should be saying.
That was not right no matter how you think about it.
But you got mad for my sake, so I feel better.
If something that small makes you feel better, then you come cheap.
Being like that would make your friendships come cheap, too.
Friendships are more important to me, anyway.
That would be making pretend friends.
I got to talk to Murao Shuuko!
But... even if they are pretend friends,
it is a lot better than being on my own.
I am sorry about back then.
I was the closest to you, and even saw it...
Hey, why are you getting involved with someone like her?
Eating her bentou on her own is so strange.
Would not it be nice if the boys talked to her?
And you know, a heart being on that cake...
She is just putting on a cute act for the boys.
Being like that would make your friendships come cheap, too.
would not that just mean that you want people to care about you?
If so, maybe we should act that way, too.
I just hate girls like her.
If you hate her, you can just ignore her.
You are just so envious of her you cannot ignore her!
I am in such a bad mood now.
I thought I would make high school better.
So that I can get along with people.
Do not get all flirty in the school.
You have not even started yet, have you?
You are dropping the honorific that suddenly?
The 5 students selected as the class leaders
to participate in the spring's leader orientation.
Tanaka-sensei will explain the details of the orientation.
In Leader Orientation, the leaders of each class lodge together
and create a plan for the year's events.
The athletic festival, school festival, field trips...
One year of life in high school is busy and will pass quickly,
but what kind of life it will be is up to you all.
On that note, is there anyone who is up to the task?
I have not even started anything yet.
In that case, I have to try starting something!
- Hey, what are- - I already said it!
you will be sleeping and eating together as part of Leader Orientation.
You are preparing to be able to help everyone in your classes.
- I am wearing gloves so I will be fine.
I know the thing that you are hiding, Sensei.
The mole in your double eyelid.
You are the first one to realize it, Murao.
Then... do not tell anyone but me about it.
I cannot make a promise like that.
Here, head back over to where everyone else is.
You can handle that just fine, Yoshioka.
It is okay, I will do it.
And at tonight's meeting, we are going over the significance of school events
so we will all do the sheet together.
I have a bit of a headache.
But I volunteered to do it, so...
It is one of those if I do not give it my all, what then?
I do not think carrying all of the burden is all there is to leadership, though.
is to set up plans for events that cannot be completed except as a group.
We need to improve the sense of belonging that everyone has.
In relation to the sense of self, doing things with others
will help reshape each person's position, responsibility, and behavior.
If we consider that the desired result of the events, then this will lead us to far better school events.
to create memories... of fun times.
You came up with that yourself, right?
Class 2 is starting out like that, then.
Today you will have no free time.
Be sure you think of something together.
is to hold events that give us the ability to adapt to society-
It is hard to tell if it is morning or night.
You are the same, are not you?
being a leader is too much for me.
Nobody will be troubled if you feel defeated so soon.
Long after they are done, when you remember them,
and the things you experienced with everyone else...
It is just fine if you all make those happy memories.
Hey, do you know where Mabuchi went?
Are not you guys being too distant?
The start of a new day.
will never forget this sunrise we are all seeing together!
We will ride out adolescence together!
You are done if this makes you embarrassed.
Things like growing cold can wait until we are old men and women!
You do not seem like you will change even when you are an old man, Kominato-kun.
You are really loudmouthed in that way.
Hey, wait... can you not say loudmouthed?
Would these be pretend friendships, too?
After that, the leadership group fell under Kominato Rule.
Whether there is something to do or not, we get together once per week.
You did all on your own.
Coming or not as you please... are you a kindergartener?
Okay, on that note, just like it says
- You are all really at it.
The orientation report for the school's newsletter...
I want to have one of you do it.
You are good at writing, right?
This is my chance to walk home with Shuuko.
No, if you do it, it will be like an elementary student did it.
I said I will do it, so I will do it.
No, your writing is messy too.
- You will not finish it before the end of the day.
What do you think of Mabuchi-kun?
think I have fallen for him.
I have a feeling that you like him, too.
We just went to the same middle school.
He has that air of, Are not I so cool for not putting in my all?
I had no idea what I would do if you were a rival.
Oh, hey, you are going to be late for cram school.
it is not that I like him.
and being able to barely see his eyes behind his bangs...
these are all more interesting to me than they were before.
That is the same habit you had before!
That is not what I mean!
You are so different from before
so I wonder why you have changed so much.
Do not try and find the old me.
You will be a loser forever if you clutch your memories like that.
I definitely do not like him!
- Where is Mabuchi? - I made him go home.
you are going to hand that in, and to go on ahead.
I meant for you to go on home, though.
Are you thinking that I thought I said too much and would wait for you-
I thought that I did not like the new Kou.
But I realized that I was lying to myself.
Then... no matter who things go well for,
let us not hold it against each other, okay?
But I do not think it will work out for me if it is you.
Oh, I am going to the bathroom.
I was... actually scared to say it.
I thought that if I said it...
I would lose a precious friend I would finally made.
But I also thought that I have to say it
precisely because she is a precious friend.
I am feeling hungry... maybe we should eat something.
I thought that I could say it if it were to you two.
Well, Mabuchi is the one who has to decide, though.
He might even turn you both down.
And if it goes well for one of you...
I will always be neutral to both of you.
Both of you, do your best.
So you see... the problem is Tanaka-sensei, after all.
I do not understand the feelings of women who fall for older guys!
I am the one who has tighter skin!
You are as loud as ever.
Stop messing around and study a little.
You will bring down the number of graduates.
The guy next to him... he was at Nagasaki Seiran High.
Coming here from that Seiran is not special at all.
- Like he could not keep up?
- Seiran is not a big deal, either.
You guys need to get a grip.
He had nothing to do with it.
And why are you the one getting mad?
If your friend were getting spoken to like this, you would be pissed too.
have given up looking for the old Kou.
I want to get to know the new Kou.
Everything that I do not know from the 4 years you were in Nagasaki.
Hey, why did you come back here?
Are you living in the same place?
It has nothing to do with you.
It does not have nothing to do with me!
Suddenly going away, and then suddenly reappearing...
There are actually so many things that I want to ask you!
I am asking you because I have not sorted it all out in my head yet!
Please just... do not step into other people's space any more than you already have.
Is Kou ditching the meeting again?
Forget that... why in summer vacation, too?
You know, the festival and field trip are soon after the new semester starts.
What will happen if we do not do this now?
I wonder if something happened to Mabuchi-kun.
He has not replied on LINE, either.
It is like he is avoiding us.
Kou is actually... my little brother.
We are trying to keep life simple at school
by keeping it secret from the students, though.
But I want to ask about Kou, too.
He shows you a little bit of expression, after all.
In his first year of middle school,
our parents divorced, and I stayed here with our dad.
Kou went to our mom's parents' place in Nagasaki with her.
Why did he come back here?
He came back here because of that.
I could not be with him when life was at its hardest.
I am the only one who can be with her right now.
We can consider it to be in its final stages.
Her back pain is most likely due to her bones changing.
I am sorry to say it, but...
The results seem to have been good.
but I might not make it.
could not handle seeing her emaciated body.
I made excuses like work, or Nagasaki being too far.
Kou could not forgive himself for being unable to help.
He got absorbed in other things,
and started thinking that he just is not allowed to enjoy himself.
carrying feelings like that the whole time.
He is actually a kind, good guy.
A promise that I would take care of our mom.
I gave him my word that I would support her.
I put my all into my studies, too.
So she could live in comfort once I became a doctor.
I did not even realize that she was ill.
At the side of my mother growing thinner and thinner,
as if she were already prepared to leave this world...
You do not understand, do you?
You do not need to understand.
You get tired of a lot of things
when you find things important to you.
I do not... not one bit!
Is wanting to understand from the bottom of my heart not okay?
Being scared of losing what is important to you
is pointless if you distance yourself from us all!
That is why if you get absorbed in something,
and someone gives you a hard time for enjoying yourself...
If there is someone like that,
even if it is your mom,
I will beat that person up!
At the clock in Sankaku Park.
You did not say anything except that, so...
I thought, that was not a date...
At the clock in Sankaku Park.
meant as a new promise to you.
I can rewrite what happened that day 4 years ago!
This time, I will tell Kou that I like him!
Something came up that I cannot get away from.
Uhh... what time can you make it?
I will wait until whenever that is!
I am actually in Nagasaki right now.
I was not able to get a hold of Kou after that day.
I was just wondering, Is it second semester yet?
and was scared that Kou would disappear somewhere again.
Mabuchi seems strange since second semester started...
He does not even come to our meetings at all.
I have been saying we need to prepare for the culture festival, but it is all on LINE.
Kominato, do you know if he is seeing someone?
No... if I ask him, he just dodges the question.
But it does sound like it is a girl.
One from his time in Nagasaki.
I actually confessed to Mabuchi during summer vacation.
I thought I would try and get a leg up on you, but he turned me down.
At that time, he told me there is someone he cannot leave alone.
I was convinced that it was you...
You do not need to answer that?
There is a lot going on with an old classmate from Nagasaki.
To make up for the summer festival,
If you do not want to, it is okay.
Your boyfriend just left... was there a fight?
It turns out I will be living with my mom.
So I will be heading out your way.
We can see each other again.
That DVD I borrowed from you before-
Can we talk about that later?
I am going to give priority to that friend I made a promise with first.
Everyone, are you having a good time?
The theme for this year's Sakigaya festival is markets.
Please enjoy all the stalls representing countries from around the world!
Want to try doing a before-and-after comparison?
The match to decide the best arm wrestler is right here!
Kominato, you need to put on some pants.
I cannot let myself lose to Shuuko.
Is this the same as what you ordered?
Shuuko-chan suits the masculine clothing too well!
Kominato's idea of doing reverse maids and butlers is such a hit!
You did not get lost on the way?
That is some outfit you are wearing!
She is a middle-school classmate from Nagasaki.
The appearance of a girl from his 4 years away, then.
I will show you around later.
Oh, but you have a sweet tooth, right?
She will have one Kominato Special.
Yoshioka-san, you look great as a butler!
Oh, well, that is because I am not very feminine.
But, Yoshioka-san, you are such a girl.
Come to the stage at the end.
We are just a thrown-together band, though.
These people jumping into the picture?
Do you have class tomorrow, too?
I had to cancel our summer plans at the last second, right?
You still have cleaning up to do!
Please take the filled boxes of equipment to the leaders' room.
Why are you running away from me?
- Why are you mad? - I am not!
It is the same as if it never happened.
is it okay if it is not an accident?
If you do not want to, you can pull away.
For canceling our plans at the last second...
Her parents are divorced as well
and her dad had been looking after her.
Telling something like that to you would be... you know.
But I understand how she is feeling right now better than anyone else.
It is... space I should not step into, right?
You know... before you get all soaked in sentimentality, help with cleaning up!
Seriously... thanks to your slightly triangular relationship...
Do you know a girl named Narumi Yui?
Narumi is a classmate from Nagasaki.
The police were asking about her at school.
It seems she came here to visit
in order to run away from home.
She is been staying with a relative since her father died, right?
But she told me she is going to live with her mother here.
Her mother seems to have said no.
Her mom has a new family.
Since she had something from our festival, the police called us.
I listened to the story, and she says she is a friend of yours.
If I said it was all...
It seems that until her family decides where she will be staying, her mother will take care of her.
I got caught up in the mood.
Right now is the time when the season is changing,
so I think there are people here who cannot quite get in the mood.
He is been off for a week already.
Narumi-cchi seems to have it pretty rough staying with her mother.
So he is taking care of her.
Her relatives are still arguing over who is going to keep her.
I wonder what Mabuchi-kun will do if she has nowhere to go?
He might feel he has to take care of girls who feel that weak.
want to take back Kou's smile.
I would like you to let him go.
I know that you are having trouble right now,
and that there is a pain only you and he understand.
We had finally started making progress, and...
I do not have anyone but Kou-chan.
I want him with me no matter what.
I will do anything if it is for that.
If acting all righteous to try and trick us
is as far as your feelings go, then you are the one who needs to give up.
You only came to complain to me out of desperation
because the thought of losing Kou-chan is too painful, right?
This delusion that time stops for him when he is around me
is to try and push me away!
just wanted to come up with a reason not give up on Kou.
I am pretty stubborn, are not I?
Do not go thinking strange things.
Today, I was dropping off some papers
and a guy saw me opening a door with my feet.
Another person driven away by my mannerisms.
Habits are really hard to get rid of, are not they?
You are missing a button there.
I came to you so you could clearly turn me down.
So that I can come to terms with a broken heart,
I want you to turn me down properly.
But we will stay friends after this, too, okay?
I remember things I hate like sounds,
Does something like this not happen to you?
Is he going to pick you up?
He is going to look after me until I graduate high school.
Kou-chan, I am the only one
Yoshioka-san, the aura around you has changed lately, has not it?
Or is it... you are changing it?
I have decided to graduate from being the way I was.
I will lose 1.5kg, stop running with huge strides, and stop my bursts of laughter.
I will be more feminine so that I am more popular.
I thought that if he clearly turned me down, I would be able to move forward.
But I am not doing that at all, am I?
Looking somewhere is what it is to move forward.
That is fine, is not it?
I do not think you need to force it.
Because there is someone right in front of you telling you that Yoshioka-san is fine the way she is.
What I am saying is that I like you, Yoshioka-san.
I do not really know you very well.
You can get to know me starting today.
I am saying this about myself, but...
That is the first time anyone has said they like me.
Do you think you can come to like him, too?
But when I am with Kikuchi,
I can feel a little progress.
I think that if I am with Kikuchi-kun, I can get rid of Kou's memory sooner.
I am not very confident about it, though!
Kikuchi is going to take Yoshioka away from you.
He can do what he wants.
You were just grinding your teeth like crazy.
Do not make yourself match Narumi-cchi's moods.
- I am not matching or feeling for her. -
People who cannot consider their own happiness
should not be proud of supporting other people.
You are such a nice guy it rubs off on people.
Being with you, I had a feeling I could go back to the old me.
But then things came up with Narumi.
I then realized I really could not forgive myself.
That is why, until Narumi can stand on her own two feet,
I decided I will be responsible for her.
The only one getting heated up was me.
To the point our moods were so different I could not get anything across.
I do not think you are very lame at all.
Are you saying I am coo-
I wonder how things would be if we had met sooner.
I could have been around when things were hardest for him.
I wanted to do something for him.
There is still something you can do, right?
This is a field trip that will round out the year,
but to keep you from first saying Kyuushuu is large, fun, and has delicious food!
and then letting loose, every class must follow the plan that they submitted for their free days.
Can I change our plan right now?
Do not be suspicious of it.
This is not about what happened there for you.
This is about your knowing good places to go for a date there.
If you are thankful for anything I have done, help me out.
So that things start going well between Shuuko and I.
Are things going well with your uncle and the others?
Kou-chan: We are going to Nagasaki for our trip.
Unlike him, I will not let go of you.
When I am in a large group of people,
Even if I get the wrong person, I look for you.
And when I am trying to find you,
no matter how big the group is,
I wonder if that is what it is to fall in love.
The first day of our trip!
Let us get really into it!
Have we finished changing seats around?
we will be shuffling around the seats!
You may not know who you will be sitting next to.
Does his little trick seem like it is on purpose?
He is doing the best he can in his own way, I would think.
I wonder if it will go well.
I am counting on you to take care of Kou.
You plan to sneak out to see Narumi-cchi?
What the hell is with you?
I did not go through the trouble of getting us to Nagasaki so you could do that, you idiot!
What do you mean, the trouble?
The reason that I had it changed to Nagasaki.
If we are going to fight the past, you are the only one who can take that place.
You are the only one who knows the old Mabuchi.
But I have plans with Kikuchi-kun.
The one who can get him there
You said that you want to take back Mabuchi's smile, right?
Can you really not forgive yourself?
How about making sure of that?
at least kick away the past first.
That is what we are asking of you.
Okay, do not be late for meeting back up!
Everyone, make sure you come back!
Please let me take Futaba-chan for the day.
If one of your friends was sending out a distress signal,
you would go save that friend, right?
You really do not look like, and are not like, Tanaka-kun.
Always dragging along and whining about stuff in the past...
You are a loser yourself, Kou.
Bedsores that got worse every day
and so much vomit you know the end is coming.
In the end, she could not even remember your name, let alone your face.
I have studied a lot about her illness.
I asked Tanaka-sensei a lot of questions.
And after all that, I still could not get any closer to the severity of your sadness.
My desire to understand still has not changed.
I said you do not need to know these things, did not I?
Her voice was getting hoarse back then.
Kou, how about eating together downstairs?
Then... I will leave it here.
wonder why I did not realize.
I wonder where I went wrong.
Is everything over after only one mistake?
There are not any people who take the right path every time.
of whether or not you really did make a mistake.
No matter what happens, I will help you.
That if there were somebody giving you a hard time,
I would beat that person up.
This is the area I lived in for 4 years.
When I first came here with my mom,
I did not speak for a long time.
But she kept talking to me.
Actually, I will just eat here.
There was not a girl you liked there?
but I can only remember her smiling face.
My mom came here a lot.
In hopes she would get better.
I pray that Kou has fun at his new school.
I pray that Kou remains healthy.
I pray that Kou grows to be a kind-hearted person.
I pray that Kou finds people important to him.
lives his life with a smile.
Not asking for her own sake...
is what it is to be a mother.
could not move forward, after all.
no matter where we are, right?
Back then and even now, what I see first
I knew that you, without hesitation, would always go straight after Mabuchi.
But that being the way you are
is exactly why I fell for you.
This is me being a bad loser.
I wonder if those two are okay.
Kou: I want you to come out with me one more time.
I want to see the sunrise with everyone.
We will make a good memory!
When Kou-chan transferred here 4 years ago,
he was wearing a uniform that was different from everybody else's.
He was always alone, and never fit in with other people.
After school, he would stay at his art class desk
and write graffiti on it while he was alone.
He wrote so many girly things.
Start his clock up again for him.
Even if we just stay friends!
As long as Kou will smile for me, it is okay!
If all of us can just see
Was it really okay for us to not go?
This, too, is what friendship means.
Coming all the way here might have been a pretty big detour.
Detours are what makes this Aoharu.
In the first year of middle school,
When I was in the jail in cops and robbers,
you ran straight to me to get me out.
But before you could, you fell straight down.
My sides hurt just remembering it!
I am the loser for desperately clinging to my memories.
I did then, and I do now.
You are okay with someone like me?
I have never liked anyone but you,

We will be at the airport soon.
Make sure you are not leaving anything behind!
Mistakes are always made in our adolescence,
it is adolescence exactly because there are mistakes.
